definitions.definition: used as a polite way of asking for something or telling somebody to do something

examples.text: Please could I leave early today?

definitions.definition: used to add force to a request or statement

examples.text: Please don't leave me here alone.
Please, I don't understand what I have to do.

definitions.definition: used as a polite way of accepting something
used to ask somebody to stop behaving badly

examples.text: Children, please! I'm trying to work.

definitions.definition: used when you are replying to somebody who has said something that you think is stupid

examples.text: Oh, please! You cannot be serious.

wordOrigin: Middle English: from Old French plaisir ‘to please’, from Latin placere.
